title: Moorcock
description:
The promised Eternal Champion torrent. Includes P. Craig Russell's adaptations of Moorcock's Elric material. Also includes Elric's crossover with Conan (including a little-known sequel to the story, which appeared in the black and white Marvel magazine some years later). Alas, this does not include the James Cawthorn adaptations of Elric and Hawkmoon, but those are scarce. Nor does it include the Druillet adaptation/portfolio. What it DOES include, however, is some role playing game manuals, The story that appeared in Star-Reach, Frank Brunner's adaptation, Wendy Pini's artbook for an aborted animated film, The very first Elric adaptation from Windy City comics (never reprinted), 2 issues of the Tom Strong series, and Elric: The Balance Lost. I've also included TMM's Multiverse, a DC 12 issue maxi series that features a team up of some of the incarnations of the Eternal Champion.

A Note on the latter: I have edited MMM into the 2 component Elric tales: Duke Elric and Zenith the Albino. The two tales crossover, and both feature Elric, so I feel justified in doing so. If you want to read the original miniseries in unadulterated form, it's here as well.

Torrent details:

Corum:
Chronicles of Corum 1-12
The Bull and the Ram 1-4

Elric
00 The Making of a Sorcerer
01 Elric of Melnibone' (Frank Brunner's adaptation, from Heavy Metal + Pacific Comics series 1-6)
02 Sailor on the Seas of Fate (+ 3 page Robert Gould illustrated poem from Heavy Metal #20)
03 Elric and Conan
05 The Dreaming City (orig PCR version from Heavy Metal + later completed GN version) + Dreaming City Comics adaptation
06 Weird of the White Wolf (Bookended with Prisoner of Pan Tang from Star Reach, and PCR's While The Gods Laugh From Epic Illustrated #14)
07 The Vanishing Tower
08 Bane of the Black Sword
09 Dreams of a Thousand Years (Tom Strong, Duke Elric, Count Zenith)
10 The Balance Lost
11 Stormbringer

Art:
Frank Brunner art book
Wendy Pino art book
assorted pinups

Hawkmoon:
01 Jewel In The Skull
02 The Mad God's Amulet
03 The Sword of the Dawn
04 The Runestaff

Jerry Cornelius (appearances)
Adventures of Luther Arkwright
Midnight Kiss
Sebastian O
The Adventures of the English Assassin (newspaper strip)
League Of Extraordinary Gentlemen v3 - The Black Dossier (2007)

Michael Moorcock's Multiverse 1-12
Behold the Man (from Unknown Worlds of Science Fiction 06)
michael moorcock and the comics of the multiverse
One Life Furnished In Early Moorcock (Topps) (Neil Gaiman and PCR)
The Swords of Heaven, the Flowers of Hell (Howard Chaykin)

Also includes RPG manuals for Corum, Hawkmoon, Elric, etc.

Thanks to original scanners, and of course The Man Himself.
